verbs.description: Despite his assertion that he [V: has] done nothing wrong , Trump believes he could pardon himself .
Despite his assertion that [ARG0: he] has [V: done] [ARG1: nothing wrong] , Trump believes he could pardon himself .
[ARGM-ADV: Despite his assertion that he has done nothing wrong] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: believes] [ARG1: he could pardon himself] .
Despite his assertion that he has done nothing wrong , Trump believes he [V: could] pardon himself .
Despite his assertion that he has done nothing wrong , Trump believes [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: pardon] [ARG1: himself] .
